verses.verse: Now Jericho <WH3405> was straightly shut <WH5462> up because <WH6440> of the children <WH1121> of Israel: <WH3478> none <WH369> went <WH3318> out, and none <WH369> came <WH935> in.

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> to Joshua, <WH3091> See, <WH7200> I have given <WH5414> into your hand <WH3027> Jericho, <WH3405> and the king <WH4428> thereof, and the mighty <WH1368> men of valor. <WH2428>

And you shall compass <WH5437> the city, <WH5892> all <WH3605> you men <WH582> of war, <WH4421> and go <WH5362> round <WH5362> about the city <WH5892> once. <WH259> Thus <WH3541> shall you do <WH6213> six <WH8337> days. <WH3117>

And seven <WH7651> priests <WH3548> shall bear <WH5375> before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> seven <WH7651> trumpets <WH7782> of rams' <WH3104> horns: <WH3104> and the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> you shall compass <WH5437> the city <WH5892> seven <WH7651> times, <WH6471> and the priests <WH3548> shall blow <WH8628> with the trumpets. <WH7782>

And it shall come <WH1961> to pass, that when they make a long <WH4900> blast with the ram's <WH3104> horn, <WH7161> and when you hear <WH8085> the sound <WH6963> of the trumpet, <WH7782> all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> shall shout <WH7321> with a great <WH1419> shout; <WH8643> and the wall <WH2346> of the city <WH5892> shall fall <WH5307> down flat, <WH8478> and the people <WH5971> shall ascend <WH5927> up every man <WH376> straight before <WH5048> him.

And Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126> called <WH7121> the priests, <WH3548> and said <WH559> to them, Take <WH5375> up the ark <WH727> of the covenant, <WH1285> and let seven <WH7651> priests <WH3548> bear <WH5375> seven <WH7651> trumpets <WH7782> of rams' <WH3104> horns <WH3104> before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> of the LORD. <WH3068>

And he said <WH559> to the people, <WH5971> Pass <WH5674> on, and compass <WH5437> the city, <WH5892> and let him that is armed <WH2502> pass <WH5674> on <WH413> before <WH6440> the ark of the LORD. <WH3068>

And it came <WH1961> to pass, when Joshua <WH3091> had spoken <WH559> to the people, <WH5971> that the seven <WH7651> priests <WH3548> bearing <WH5375> the seven <WH7651> trumpets <WH7782> of rams' <WH3104> horns <WH3104> passed <WH5674> on <WH413> before <WH6440> the LORD, <WH3068> and blew <WH8628> with the trumpets: <WH7782> and the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the LORD <WH3068> followed <WH1980> <WH310> them.

And the armed <WH2502> men went <WH1980> before <WH6440> the priests <WH3548> that blew <WH8628> with the trumpets, <WH7782> and the rear guard <WH622> came <WH1980> after <WH310> the ark, <WH727> the priests <WH3548> going <WH1980> on, and blowing <WH8628> with the trumpets. <WH7782>

And Joshua <WH3091> had commanded <WH6680> the people, <WH5971> saying, <WH559> You shall not shout, <WH7321> nor <WH3808> make any noise <WH8085> with your voice, <WH6963> neither <WH3808> shall any word <WH1697> proceed <WH3318> out of your mouth, <WH6310> until <WH5704> the day <WH3117> I bid <WH559> you shout; <WH7321> then shall you shout. <WH7321>

So the ark <WH727> of the LORD <WH3068> compassed <WH5437> the city, <WH5892> going <WH5362> about <WH5362> it once: <WH259> and they came <WH935> into the camp, <WH4264> and lodged <WH3885> in the camp. <WH4264>
And Joshua <WH3091> rose <WH7925> early <WH7925> in the morning, <WH1242> and the priests <WH3548> took <WH5375> up the ark <WH727> of the LORD. <WH3068>

And seven <WH7651> priests bearing <WH5375> seven <WH7651> trumpets <WH7782> of rams' <WH3104> horns <WH3104> before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> of the LORD <WH3068> went <WH1980> on <WH413> continually, <WH1980> and blew <WH8628> with the trumpets: <WH7782> and the armed <WH2502> men went <WH1980> before <WH6440> them; but the rear guard <WH622> came <WH1980> after <WH310> the ark <WH727> of the LORD, <WH3068> the priests <WH3548> going <WH1980> on, <WH413> and blowing <WH8628> with the trumpets. <WH7782>
And the second <WH8145> day <WH3117> they compassed <WH5437> the city <WH5892> once, <WH259> and returned <WH7725> into the camp: <WH4264> so <WH3541> they did <WH6213> six <WH8337> days. <WH3117>

And it came <WH1961> to pass on the seventh <WH7637> day, <WH3117> that they rose <WH7925> early <WH7925> about the dawning <WH5927> of the day, <WH7837> and compassed <WH5437> the city <WH5892> after the same <WH2088> manner <WH4941> seven <WH7651> times: <WH6471> only <WH7535> on that day <WH3117> they compassed <WH5437> the city <WH5892> seven <WH7651> times. <WH6471>

And it came <WH1961> to pass at the seventh <WH7637> time, <WH6471> when the priests <WH3548> blew <WH8628> with the trumpets, <WH7782> Joshua <WH3091> said <WH559> to the people, <WH5971> Shout; <WH7321> for the LORD <WH3068> has given <WH5414> you the city. <WH5892>

And the city <WH5892> shall be accursed, <WH2764> even it, and all <WH3605> that are therein, to the LORD: <WH3068> only <WH7535> Rahab <WH7343> the harlot <WH2181> shall live, <WH2421> she and all <WH3605> that are with her in the house, <WH1004> because <WH3588> she hid <WH2244> the messengers <WH4397> that we sent. <WH7971>

And you, in any wise keep <WH8104> yourselves from the accursed <WH2764> thing, lest <WH6435> you make yourselves accursed, <WH2763> when you take <WH3947> of the accursed <WH2764> thing, and make <WH7760> the camp <WH4264> of Israel <WH3478> a curse, <WH2764> and trouble <WH5916> it.

But all <WH3605> the silver, <WH3701> and gold, <WH2091> and vessels <WH3627> of brass <WH5178> and iron, <WH1270> are consecrated <WH6944> to the LORD: <WH3068> they shall come <WH935> into the treasury <WH214> of the LORD. <WH3068>

So the people <WH5971> shouted <WH7321> when the priests <WH3548> blew <WH8628> with the trumpets: <WH7782> and it came <WH1961> to pass, when the people <WH5971> heard <WH8085> the sound <WH6963> of the trumpet, <WH7782> and the people <WH5971> shouted <WH7321> with a great <WH1419> shout, <WH8643> that the wall <WH2346> fell <WH5307> down flat, <WH8478> so that the people <WH5971> went <WH5927> up into the city, <WH5892> every man <WH376> straight before <WH5048> him, and they took <WH3920> the city. <WH5892>

And they utterly destroyed <WH2763> all <WH3605> that was in the city, <WH5892> both man <WH376> and woman, <WH802> young <WH5288> and old, <WH2205> and ox, <WH7794> and sheep, <WH7716> and ass, <WH2543> with the edge <WH6310> of the sword. <WH2719>

But Joshua <WH3091> had said <WH559> to the two <WH8147> men <WH582> that had spied <WH7270> out the country, <WH776> Go <WH935> into the harlot's <WH2181> house, <WH1004> and bring <WH3318> out there <WH8033> the woman, <WH802> and all <WH3605> that she has, as you swore <WH7650> to her.

And the young <WH5288> men that were spies <WH7270> went <WH935> in, and brought <WH3318> out Rahab, <WH7343> and her father, <WH1> and her mother, <WH517> and her brothers, <WH251> and all <WH3605> that she had; and they brought <WH3318> out all <WH3605> her kindred, <WH4940> and left <WH5117> them without <WH2351> the camp <WH4264> of Israel. <WH3478>

And they burnt <WH8313> the city <WH5892> with fire, <WH784> and all <WH3605> that was therein: only <WH7535> the silver, <WH3701> and the gold, <WH2091> and the vessels <WH3627> of brass <WH5178> and of iron, <WH1270> they put <WH5414> into the treasury <WH214> of the house <WH1004> of the LORD. <WH3068>

And Joshua <WH3091> saved <WH2421> Rahab <WH7343> the harlot <WH2181> alive, <WH2421> and her father's <WH1> household, <WH1004> and all <WH3605> that she had; and she dwells <WH3427> in Israel <WH3478> even to this <WH2088> day; <WH3117> because <WH3588> she hid <WH2244> the messengers, <WH4397> which <WH834> Joshua <WH3091> sent <WH7971> to spy <WH7270> out Jericho. <WH3405>

And Joshua <WH3091> adjured <WH7650> them at that time, <WH6256> saying, <WH559> Cursed <WH779> be the man <WH376> before <WH6440> the LORD, <WH3068> that rises <WH6965> up and builds <WH1129> this <WH2063> city <WH5892> Jericho: <WH3405> he shall lay the foundation <WH3245> thereof in his firstborn, <WH1060> and in his youngest <WH6810> son shall he set <WH5324> up the gates <WH1817> of it.
So the LORD <WH3068> was with Joshua; <WH3091> and his fame <WH8089> was noised throughout all <WH3605> the country. <WH776>
